snippet.title: Job Loss Fears Lead to Unhappiness in Work, Family Life
snippet.description: Blue-collar workers take unemployment worries the hardest, research finds...less productively than the other groups studied," Caballer said.The study was published in The Spanish Journal of Psychology...
